name: Portfolio Backend V2
description: A modern backend portfolio built with Next.js, Bun, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui

agents.name: frontend-agent
agents.description: Handles frontend components, pages, and client-side logic
agents.guidelines: Follow React best practices, use Server Components by default, mark client components with 'use client' directive

agents.name: backend-agent
agents.description: Handles API routes, database operations, and server-side logic
agents.guidelines: Use proper HTTP methods, implement comprehensive error handling, return consistent API responses

agents.name: infrastructure-agent
agents.description: Handles configuration, deployment, and project setup
agents.guidelines: Follow Next.js best practices, optimize for production, maintain security standards

agents.name: quality-agent
agents.description: Handles code quality, testing, and linting
agents.guidelines: Ensure all code passes Biome linting, maintain test coverage, enforce TypeScript strict mode
